OOC: Yes. I assumed that the weapon fired on Nightrazor was fired rapidly l=
ike a machine gun. Nightrazor's aft-plating from near midway to near his bo=
osters was hit with bullets in a line along his frame as he shot forward an=
d upwards. for a brief moment his aft stealth shielding failed with the dam=
age, but it quickly reasserted itself. 

Preston 
(Nightrazr)

g@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@...> wrote:

oler cushion

omally and

he fired

uo from his vantage point. As they rose

closely. He could tell that the ship had

, but these two were a different matter.

loser he realized what they were doing. The

face would be stalled or redirected by his

ion he could be discovered by indirect

ught by the click of a magazine being

ith a burst of power he shot foward and up, putting as much distance

tween him and the warmth comming from the surface below, even as the

ll clip of trackeing bullets were unleashed by Chop.

ts ripped into his aft armor causing pain to flood his

cloaking field flickered. For the briefest of moments

dynamic ebony form was revealed as he moved away . . .

e as he passed out from beneath them.

particles from his engines attracted the

Chop as Nightrazor pushed his engiens
> > temporarilly beyond what his cloa=
king shields could handle. But the

the ship rose further into the air

its presence.

e knew as soon as he

d no doubt open fire,

 power, now well

gher and higher
> > into the air.

rom a distance or move on, he was really

defenders plus a well armed ship.
